frontCard: Who was the first president of United States?
fullText: George Washigton was the first president of United States.

frontCard: Who was the third president of the United States?
fullText: Thomas Jefferson was the third president of the United States.

frontCard: Who was the fifth president of the United States?
fullText: James Monroe was the fifth president of the United States?.

frontCard: What was Abraham Lincoln before he became president?
fullText: Abraham Lincoln was a lawyer before he became president.

frontCard: Who was the first president who live in the White House?
fullText: John Adams was the first president who live in the White House?.

frontCard: Who was the first president who own an automobile?
fullText: William Howard Taft was the first president who own an automobile?.
